forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with a steady, soaking rain overnight. Increasing winds. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
